A Blog about Linux, Programming and Misinformation...

About Jon Kuperman

I'm a web programmer in my mid-twenties. I run a Michigan Web Design Company I'm an avid Linux enthusiast, PHP developer and I love building web applications.

I'm currently working as a Software Engineer for Barracuda Networks on their Backup product.

I run the PHP User Group in Ann Arbor. I love Speaking at Conferences across the country.

In my free time I love playing soccer, hanging out with my dogs and my awesome girlfriend Kelly King!

If you like the same things and want to talk, send me an email and we'll chat!
